Tabani's School of Accountancy (TSA)

Tabani's School of Accountancy (Urdu: تابانی اسکول آف اکاؤنٹنسی‎, abbreviated as: TSA) is an accountancy academy situated in Karachi, Pakistan. It was established in 1998 to provide accounting and financial study in Pakistan. It is registered with ICAP as Registered Accounting Education Tutor (RAET).[3][4][5]

Contents

  • 1 History
    • 1.1 Present
  • 2 Courses
  • 3 See also
  • 4 References
  • 5 External links

History[edit]

Present[edit]

Till date, TSA has 2 main divisions: "CA" and "ACCA" plus a subsidiary "Tabani's College" previous known as "Institute of Business Education (IBE)". Now Operating in two prime locations, P.E.C.H.S and North Nazimabad.

Courses[edit]

Tabani's School of Accountancy is offering the following courses:

  • CA
  • ACCA/FD
  • ICMA(Pakistan)
  • CMA USA
  • CIMA [6]
  • Pre-Engineering

Tabani's College (TC) is offering the following courses:

  • Intermediate XI & XII (Science & Commerce).
  • B.Com (Bachelors in Commerce from Karachi University(KU))
